#labels Featured
#Introduce Google Wave robot: Dr. Weather

= [http://wave-samples-gallery.appspot.com/about_app?app_id=10008 Dr. Weather] =

= Address =:
 * shiny-sky@appspot.com

= Usage =:
 * @city
 * @city,country
 * @city#language-code
 * @city,country#language-code

= Notice =:

~~NOT every language is supported.~~

*MANY* languages are supported, but I don't have a full list.

Known supported languages are:
 * en (default)
 * zh-cn
 * zh-hk
 * zh-tw
 * fr
 * de
 * es
 * ru
 * it
 * ps
 * fa
 * bg
 * cs
 * hr
 * da
 * nl
 * ko
 * ja
 * pl
 * th
 * vi
 * ...


*E.g.*:
 * @beijing
 * @beijing,china
 * @beijing#zh-cn
 * @beijing,china#zh-cn
 * @蘇州#zh-cn
 * @São Paulo,Brazil
